hero.description: I am a Front-End Developer with solid experience in React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, and Node.js, building modern, scalable, and high-performance web applications. My focus includes front-end architecture, componentization, UI/UX, accessibility (A11y), and continuous improvement of user experience in corporate platforms and digital products.
